title: Visually handicapped defined
context: §347-1 Visually handicapped defined. A visually handicapped person is one whose vision with correcting lenses is so defective as to interfere with the person&rsquo;s performance of ordinary activity for which eyesight is essential. [L 1947, c 108, §3; RL 1955, §109-3; am L 1959, c 246, §2; HRS §347-1; gen ch 1985]
